creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: ghostlike female figure with ashen grey face and horns holds a brilliantly colored red and orange robe like a canopy over body; arms spread outward; figure wears gold and white triangle patterned top and navy blue bottom with brilliantly colored circles; top and bottom mount are painted with silver
medium: Hanging scroll; color and gold on silk
title: Emerging from the Robe
